ComicInfo.Summary: Godyssey: Avengelyne has a nightmare about Jesus climbing down from the cross to battle Zeus and the Greek gods. Glory arrives to tell her that her dream is a premonition as Zeus has started a war against the Christian heaven (he is jealous that nobody pays attention to him anymore). Avengelyne and Glory travel to Mount Olympus to beg Zeus to stay his hand but end up insulting him instead and are forced to fight his children. Zeus blasts Avengelyne, a servant of heaven, down to Hades.
ComicInfo.Writer: Robert Place Napton,Rob Liefeld,Robert Napton,Rob Liefeld,Robert Napton
ComicInfo.Title: Godyssey
